sentence: President Donald J. Trump announces his Endorsement of Doug Mastriano for Governor of Pennsylvania pic.twitter.com/HrGKVKb7BY Liz Harrington (@realLizUSA) May 14, 2022 As I highlighted last July, Mastriano had initiated a forensic audit of the 2020 presidential election, which he outlined in an op-ed posted to his official Senate website.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Donald Trump Made His Endorsement in the PA Gubernatorial Race and People Definitely Have Thoughts
